name: Unstable Tower (dumrum)
description:
My Ludum Dare 49 Game Jam Entry (Theme: Unstable).

Try to get through the rooms as fast as possible in this top-down game before your opponent is either two rooms further than you and your unstable room collapses! Also the first one two finish room 20 wins!

Mode of Play:
- local multiplayer
- 2 players required

Controls:
Player 1: WASD-Keys
Player 2: Arrow-Keys

Credits To Assets:

Music:
Music in Game: http://soundcloud.com/mutkanto (Ville Nousiainen)
Music in Title Screen: https://opengameart.org/content/5-chiptunes-action (Juhani Junkala)
Jingle at Winning: Fantasy SFX: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/fantasy-sfx-32833

Sound Effects:
Raisers: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/epic-positive-game-risers-s...
Rest: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/ultimate-sound-fx-bundle-15...
